alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 29 at 9:15AM EST until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor is forecast to continue a slow fall while remaining within Moderate Flood stage through Wednesday morning. The river is then forecast to continue its decline into Minor Flood Stage. Residents and interests along the river should expect Moderate flood impacts through mid week becoming Minor flood impacts late this week into the weekend. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, Moderate flooding, with water covering yards and further encroaching on many low lying homes near the river. Flooding of many yards and low lying roads near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 3.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM EST Tuesday was 3.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to decline from Moderate Flood Stage into Minor Flood Stage overnight. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun St Johns River Astor 2.3 3.0 Tue 8 am 2.9 2.8 2.9 2.9 2.8 &&
